<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/teams/{teamId}/workspaces"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Lists all the workspaces of which the given `teamId` is a participant.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
